features.featureTitle: On the dashboard hero section (frontend/src/pages/EarthquakeDashboard.tsx), add a new subtitle line directly below the existing centered hero title "Real - Time Earthquake Detection Around The World". The subtitle must be rendered as an H2 and must read exactly: "Latest real-time earthquake information around the world". Keep the subtitle centered and visually secondary to the main hero title (smaller size and/or muted color), without changing the existing hero title wording, alignment, or layout.
